code: function Validation(values){let error={};const email_pattern=/^[^\s@]+@[^\s@]+\.[^\s@]+$/;const password_pattern=/^(?=.*[a-z])(?=.*[A-Z])(?=.*\d)[a-zA-Z\d]{8,}$/;if(values.email===""){error.email="Name should not be empty";}else if(!email_pattern.test(values.email)){error.email="Email Didn't match";}else{error.email="";}if(values.password===""){error.password="Password should not be empty";}else if(!password_pattern.test(values.password)){error.password="Password didn't match";}else{error.password="";}return error;}export default Validation;
